DFA suspends consular operations nationwide on May 25 for Eid'l Fitr tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739350 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739350/dfa-suspends-consular-operations-nationwide-on-may-25-for-eid-l-fitr/story/ The Department of Foreign Affairs - Office of Consular Affairs (OCA) on Friday announced that it suspended operations of its consular offices nationwide on Monday, May 25, 2020 in observance of Eid l Fitr or the Feast of Ramadan. Fri, 22 May 2020 15:17:27 +0800
UP experts see over 9k new COVID-19 cases in NCR by June 15 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739345 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739345/up-experts-see-over-9k-new-covid-19-cases-in-ncr-by-june-15/story/ Experts from the University of the Philippines (UP) see more than 9,000 new COVID-19 cases in Metro Manila by June 15 if current trends and community quarantine measures continue. Fri, 22 May 2020 14:38:46 +0800
Biker, patay matapos tumumba sa kahabaan ng EDSA --Bong Nebrija tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739341 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/739341/biker-patay-matapos-tumumba-sa-kahabaan-ng-edsa-bong-nebrija/story/ Biglang tumumba ang isang biker habang binabaybay ang EDSA nitong Biyernes ng umaga, ayon sa isang social media post ni Metro Manila Development Authority (MMDA) special traffic and transport zone head Bong Nebrija. Fri, 22 May 2020 14:23:09 +0800
NCRPO chief Sinas: Any form of mass gathering not allowed during Eid l Fitr tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739342 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/739342/ncrpo-chief-sinas-reminds-any-forms-of-mass-gathering-not-allowed-during-eid-l-fitr/story/ "Every year talagang nagtitipon-tipon ang mga 'yan. Kaya nga ang ginawa namin, kinausap namin ang mga Imams na based sa directive ng IATF, close pa rin 'yung malalaking mosques, wala pa rin pagtitipon kasi 'yun 'yung policy ng IATF," NCRPO chief Police Major General Debold Sinas said. "Ang sabi ni chief PNP magprepare kami kasi 'yung mga mosques, guwardiyahan atsaka tingnan na 'yung directive ng IATF ay masunod na walang pagtitipon-tipon o pagdadasal..." he added. Fri, 22 May 2020 14:12:10 +0800
Cops seize medicines unregistered with FDA, nab 2 Chinese in Cavite tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739337 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/739337/cops-seize-medicines-unregistered-with-fda-nab-2-chinese-in-cavite/story/ Two Chinese nationals were arrested during a raid in Bacoor, Cavite on Friday for possessing medicines supposedly to cure coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) that are not registered with the Food and Drug Administration, authorities said. Fri, 22 May 2020 13:54:40 +0800
Pre-symptomatic cases different from asymptomatic, DOH clarifies tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739335 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739335/pre-symptomatic-cases-different-from-asymptomatic-doh-clarifies/story/ "Ang gusto ko pong linawin mayroon po tayong tinatawag na pre-symptomatic individuals na ito po ang mga tao na maaaring mayroon ho sila ng virus sa kanila at maaaring magkaroon ng sakit in how many days mag-uumpisa na. At ito po 'yung mga maaaring nakikita ng ating mga kababayan na nagpopositibo pagkatapos," Health Undersecretary Maria Rosario Vergeire said. Fri, 22 May 2020 13:44:16 +0800
Palace: Let Duque do his job amid COVID-19 emergency tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739334 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739334/palace-let-duque-do-his-job-amid-covid-19-emergency/story/ “Secretary Duque serves at the pleasure of the appointing authority, President Rodrigo Roa Duterte, in this challenging time,” presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said. Roque added Duque “will answer allegations in the proper forum but for now let us allow him to do his job during this global health emergency.” Fri, 22 May 2020 13:29:45 +0800
Barangay execs required to undergo PCR test if they tested positive for COVID-19 rapid testing -- DILG s Diño tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739330 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739330/barangay-execs-required-to-undergo-pcr-test-if-they-tested-positive-for-covid-19-rapid-testing-dilg-s-dino/story/ "Kapag ikaw ay government official, obligado ka. Wala kang karapatang tumanggi dahil unang-una, ang dapat pangalagaan ng pamahalaan ay mga frontliner. Mga frontliner kami sa barangay, kami ang humaharap sa tao kaya nga sabi ko nga sa inyo, kami ang pinaka-delikado," DILG Undersecretary Martin Diño said. "Pag ikaw ay nagundergo sa swab testing, hindi lang sarili mo ang nililigtas kung hindi ang iyong pamilya at mga constituents," he added. Fri, 22 May 2020 13:17:09 +0800
Gov t information drive on COVID-19 response still organized -- Palace tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739328 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739328/gov-t-information-drive-on-covid-19-response-still-organized-palace/story/ “Ang tingin ko naman po ay organized naman po. Kaya nga lang po, Senate hearing iyon siyempre medyo natataranta iyong ibang kasama natin, so medyo iba ang mga nasasabi,” presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said. “Pero by and large, until nangyari naman po itong insidenteng ito, tingin ko it has been centralized and it has been rather effective.” Fri, 22 May 2020 12:48:49 +0800
Condoning farmers' debts from CARP, a worthy COVID-19 response--Recto tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739327 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739327/condoning-farmers-debts-from-carp-a-worthy-covid-19-response-recto/story/ Releasing Filipino farmers from the shackles of unpaid balances under the Comprehensive Agrarian Reform Program (CARP) would be a significant COVID-19 pandemic response, Senate President Pro Tempore Ralph Recto said Friday. Fri, 22 May 2020 12:47:53 +0800

Fri, 22 May 2020 12:36:04 +0800
Dispute between two electric companies result in 13-hour power outages in Iloilo City, solon says tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739325 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/739325/dispute-between-two-electric-companies-result-in-13-hour-power-outages-in-iloilo-city-solon-says/story/ A lawmaker has called on warring electricity companies to settle their differences amid widespread power outages in Iloilo City. 'Second wave' of COVID-19 may come from arriving OFWs -Galvez tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739323 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739323/gov-t-is-preparing-for-2nd-wave-of-covid-19-infections-galvez/story/ The chief implementer of the national policy against COVID-19 on Friday said the government is preparing for a possible second wave of infections in the country, which he fears could come from overseas Filipino workers arriving from affected areas. Fri, 22 May 2020 12:11:19 +0800
Philippine Embassy defends proposed $1.5-B US arms sale to Duterte admin tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-739322 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/739322/phl-embassy-defends-proposed-1-5-b-us-arms-sale-to-duterte-admin/story/ The Philippine Embassy in Washington on Friday defended the United States decision to sell $1.5 billion worth of military equipment and weapons to the Duterte administration as some groups expressed fears that it will contribute to human rights violations in the country.
